property.name: solr.cloudmode
property.description: Whether Solr should be started in Cloud mode

property.name: solr.demo_mode
property.description: Whether Solr should be configured for demos. If true, a collection named tweets will be created using data_driven schema

property.name: solr.znode
property.description: Zookeeper znode (only used if cloudmode is true)

property.name: solr.datadir
property.description: (Optional) Dir for Solr data where solr.xml and zoo.cfg will be created. If empty, will default to SOLR_HOME/server/solr

property.name: solr.conf
property.description: (Optional) Dir containing solr.in.sh. If empty, will default to SOLR_HOME/bin
